pkgmetadata.longdescription: # NfinderAutomatic inference of neighboring cells based on their Delaunay triangulation.## Dependencies nfinder was tested with:- python = 3.8.5- napari = 0.4.12- numpy = 1.21.2- pandas = 1.3.4- scikit-image = 0.18.3- scipy = 1.7.1- importlib-resources 5.4.0## InstallationIt can be installed with `pip` from PyPI:```pip install nfinder```## UsageFor usage examples, please check out the [notebook](https://github.com/santi-rodriguez/nfinder/blob/main/examples.ipynb) in our GitHub repository.
